articles.title: Biden and his allies look past China on climate - POLITICO
articles.description: The president and European leaders are looking to countries like Indonesia, India and South Africa for climate change breakthroughs after failing to move Beijing at the G-20 summit.
articles.content: National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan told reporters on Air Force One en route to Glasgow that China was one of the significant outliers who will not be represented at the leader level at COP26 and… [+6344 chars]

articles.author: Andrew McDonald
articles.title: Queen Elizabeth II urges leaders to ‘rise above politics’ in COP26 climate talks - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: UK monarch said world leaders could ‘achieve true statesmanship’ by tackling climate change.
articles.content:
Britain's Queen Elizabeth II urged world leaders attending the COP26 summit in Glasgow to "rise above the politics of the moment" and agree a plan to combat climate change.
The U.K. monarch addresse… [+1332 chars]

articles.title: EU seeking to launch project to help SA phase out coal at COP26 climate summit - News24
articles.description: The European Union is looking to officially launch its project to help SA phase out coal at the COP26 climate summit which started on Sunday in Glasgow, Scotland.
articles.content:
